Description:
Family Edwardian On Generous Land
Secluded behind a high privacy fence and a classic Edwardian facade is this four bedroom home sure to resonate with discerning families. Occupying a generous allotment of approximately 616m2 with a handy ROW, it may also tempt developers (STCA) to redefine the streetscape. The interior is an expression of elegance, soaring rosette ceilings, deep cornices and open fireplaces embellishing the spacious floor plan. The formal lounge features a charming open fireplace with mirrored overmantle. A balcony hugs the open plan living area, promises expansive vistas and leads to the alfresco deck. His-and-hers BIRs feature in three of four double bedrooms and there's also a tidy bathroom, laundry, walk-in pantry/linen cupboard, heating, split system air conditioning, excellent storage and ample driveway parking. Close proximity to Clarinda and Aberfeldie Parks, Essendon train station, Buckley Street shops and the area's finest schools including Aberfeldie and St Therese's Primary plus Ave Maria, PEGS, St Columba's and Lowther Hall Colleges confirms outstanding appeal.
